Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR following Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION without intermediate rejections
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that do not include any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR directly follows Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (bypassing intermediate approvers)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that are part of the three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurring after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER compared to after Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases with Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that eventually lead to Payment Handled within 5 events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events in cases where the total Amount exceeds 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR executions relative to the total number of all approval-related activities (including Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of variants where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is immediately preceded by a rejection from any role (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that eventually reach Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurrences that are not followed by any rejection or loopback activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of the frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of variants ending in Payment Handled that include exactly one occurrence of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR appears in variants that contain at least one instance of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that occur in cases with no prior rejection by any approver role
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in domestic declaration cases (inferred from absence of pre-approval steps) versus pre-paid travel cost cases
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is the final approval step before Request Payment, compared to cases requiring additional approvals
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that follow a resubmission after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs
